interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Leslie Sansone: Belly, Buns, & Thighs Slimdown - Walk Your Way Thin
Review Date: 2018/11/15
Store: Leslie Sansone  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ["You don't have to spend hours in the gym to get leaner, trimmer or stronger. Join Leslie Sansone in this exciting new program and take your walk to the next level. This 3 Mile Walk workout uses the Fit Cuff resistance tubes at the end of the walk for standing exercises that tone the lower body! A special segment follows the walk using the Fit Cuff with floor exercises for sculpting the muscles of the lower body. You will trim your thighs and firm your backend... fast! Bonus Cut: Flat Tummy - Healthy Back! In just minutes you ll learn the best exercises to flatten the tummy and get a healthy back! All of our famous features of Walk at Home workouts are in this program: Gentle Warm Up Walk; Brisk 4 and 5 mile per hour pace; Mile Markers allow you to choose 1, 2, or 3 Miles; Multi-Muscle Movements; Compound exercises for a bigger calorie burn; Easy Cool Down Walk; Stretch for a healthy end to your walk."]
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.01 Ounces', 'Director': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 25, 2018', 'Actors': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Studio': 'Bayview Films', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I did your earlier videos and then fell off exercise.  Age + laziness set in.  I needed to lose weight as my BP was out of sight.  Walking outside in WA state is tough with the rain.  I have a treadmill in the garage and was dreadfully bored.  I pulled out Leslie's old videos.  I decided to look at her new items.  I ordered several and have been amazing surprised at what she is doing now!!!  I am excited about the purchases and have been doing them everyday and eating better.  It is still early but I am focused and excited exercising with the people in the DVDs.  Somehow it is better than walking alone outside or on the treadmill.  I will throw those two in from time to time.  I was excited to see the 80-year-old doing it with the group!!!  I turn 80 in Feb and can still do all the videos so far.  My daughter, who is a nurse, says I am in better shape than many of her 60-year-old patients in the cardiac floor.  This despite taking a long hiatus from doing exercise and eating right.  I am back in the saddle and loving Leslie.  Great job, Leslie
Review Title: Bravo Leslie Sansone
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user maintains a strong affinity for visually engaging storytelling, favoring animated films and well-crafted historical dramas. Their recent purchase reflects an interest in health and fitness, suggesting an openness to narratives that promote wellness, both physically and emotionally.

- **Emotion and Engagement:** While the user’s introspective nature endures, there is a newfound enthusiasm for engaging with narratives that offer personal growth and resilience. They derive joy from stories that resonate personally, showcasing authenticity, especially when delivered by familiar figures.

- **Interest in Themes:** Their connection to themes of isolation and survival continues, complemented by an increasing appreciation for uplifting narratives and wellness-driven content. They are drawn to stories that exemplify resilience and the human spirit while embracing positive change.

- **Critical Approach:** The user remains focused on emotional depth and narrative engagement in reviews. Their high ratings indicate satisfaction with content that balances serious themes with relatable, accessible storytelling, now including fitness and self-improvement aspects.

- **Genre Awareness:** Mindful of content advisories, the user prefers intelligently crafted stories that integrate both serious and lighthearted elements, which now also extends to fitness-oriented narratives.

- **Viewing Format:** The user continues to prefer English audio with subtitles, enhancing their overall media consumption experience.

In summary, the user showcases a discerning taste for rich, emotionally impactful stories alongside a developing interest in wellness narratives, illustrating their quest for both emotional and physical well-being.
